title: Eric André
description:
This week Kevin Hart is joined by comedian, actor, and prank master Eric André on Comedy Gold Minds. No topic is off limits as the two discuss Eric’s start in Hollywood as a performer, his fearless comedy pranks, almost being stabbed while filming his movie Bad Trip with Lil Rel Howrey in Atlanta, and his relationship with drugs and psychedelics including why Eric thinks everyone should try them at least once.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Eric Andre)
